hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4H Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a period of low volatility (Bollinger Band Width < 0.02 on 4H chart) within a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the upper band with volume > 1.5x 20-period average will lead to a sustained directional move in the breakout direction for at least 2% before a significant retracement.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Compressed volatility in neutral markets often precedes significant directional moves. The volume confirmation filters out false breakouts. Current market state shows BTC failing at $90K and trading in a narrow range, suggesting a potential squeeze is forming.
entry_conditions: Price closes above upper Bollinger Band
Volume on breakout candle > 1.5x 20-period average volume

exit_conditions.stop_loss: 1.5% below entry price OR close back inside Bollinger Bands
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 55% of such breakouts fail to reach 2% profit target before hitting stop loss or time exit over a 100-trade sample.
